explanation: Both integers are read from standard input, then each arithmetic operation is calculated. Casting the numerator to double before division prevents integer truncation, and std::fixed with std::setprecision(1) formats the quotient with one decimal place to match the specification.
keyPoints: Chain std::cin extractions to read user input.
Cast to double to obtain floating-point division.
Use <iomanip> manipulators to control numeric formatting.
